scripts.test: tsc && env NODE_ENV=test mocha --reporter spec --exit --bail dist/**/*.spec.js
scripts.dbsetup: npm run dbuser && npm run dbcreate && node scripts/setupDatabase.js
scripts.dbreset: psql -c "DROP DATABASE automatedqa;" && npm run dbsetup
scripts.dbcreate: psql -c "CREATE DATABASE automatedqa WITH OWNER admin;" || true
scripts.dbuser: psql -q -c "CREATE ROLE admin WITH SUPERUSER LOGIN PASSWORD 'admin';" || true
